title: Addiction
lyrics:
R Les, NextSelection
Ay, its R Les for prez baby
Yea, just rock with me now
And I'm his running mate Loso, in case you ain't know so

You've got fashion and style
I'm lovin' your smile and
The way you get down
I can't see no one else
It's you by yourself, yea
In spite of the crowd
(Baby no one else matters)

It started off with a kiss (uh huh)
Never expectin' this (uh huh)
And now I'm here copin' with
My addiction (addiction)
It started off with a kiss (uh huh)
Never expectin' this (uh huh)
And now I'm here copin' with
My addiction
While all the girls say

I'm addicted to you
I'm addicted to you
I'm addicted to you
You're my addiction
I'm addicted to you
I'm addicted to you
I'm addicted to you
You're my addiction

When I'm lookin' in the mirror
Honey, you are all I see
And it could not be no clearer
That I need you here with me

I was hopin' you'd notice
The way that I like to
Have you around
Listen and you will find that
Your heart beats for me
Girl, I hear the sound
(And it only gets better)

It started off with a kiss (uh huh)
Never expectin' this (uh huh)
And now I'm here copin' with
My addiction (addiction)
It started off with a kiss (uh huh)
Never expectin' this (uh huh)
And now I'm here copin' with
My addiction
While all the girls say

I'm addicted to you
I'm addicted to you
I'm addicted to you
You're my addiction
I'm addicted to you
I'm addicted to you
I'm addicted to you
You're my addiction

Ya, now lemme find out I got you Amy Wine'd out (yeah)
I get 'em hooked like I threw a fishing line out (gotcha)
My white girl keep me Federline'd out (uh uh)
I'm too G so I stay Gucci signed out (Gucci)
And I get so much attention
They sit and talk about me like intervention
They say that white Phantom look so cocaine
I hop out the suicides lookin' so Kobain
And I just Courtney Love when they know your name
They like Loso, we already know so damn (damn)
They come back one more grams
Right back like Lindsay out the program, yeah

I'm addicted to you (Addiction)
I'm addicted to you
I'm addicted to you
You're my addiction (I got 'em so addicted, baby)
I'm addicted to you
I'm addicted to you (They just keep calling me man)
I'm addicted to you (I just keep calling 'em, ha ha)
You're my addiction

Yea, R Les for prez like I said
Loso is his running mate, man I'm riding with you homie
Let's get 'em, yea
What's up Street Fam
